item.title: delta
item.description: delta supports pager. delta is often specified as git’s pager, but the pager is actually called from within delta. Therefore, delta settings are often specified by writing them in gitconfig. This is an example of gitconfig settings. [core] pager = delta [delta] navigate = true side-by-side = true file-style = yellownavigate = true of delta is set to allow you to move in diff units using the n/N keys of less.
